messages.text: "Comms team wants you to do Chris Cuomo on CNN tonight at 6. Your calendar looks clear on my end.      Do you want to do it? "
"Hi mayor- can you please bring your laptop to City Hall for straight talk?"
"Yes. It's taped I might be delayed. "
"Welcome! We stalled and are doing 629 before ADA "
"Please keep the gavel until after we complete this item thx. "

"I expect our 3:30 time certain item to have approximately three hours of testimony. I would ask you to preside for the first 90 minutes of testimony. I will open the item and turn it over to Commissioner Hardesty. I will then turn it over to you to orchestrate the first 90 minutes of testimony and I'll take the second half.I need to do some multitasking this afternoon. I am assuming we will only do two minutes each. Thank you."
"Sure, glad to help. Once you take back the gavel I will likely walk while listening so please text if for some reason you need me to say something "
"You're doing a great job. Want to keep going until testimony is done?i think there are only a few left. "
"Otherwise happy to jump in at any time."
"I will hand back to you when Karla says all done. "

"Sorry to bother you but can I call you about the SPUR program? Committee demanding an answer to increase funding to $1.6 million total. That would allow funding for all BIPOC applicants who scored high across all criteria. It would be additional $400,000 from BES. Jonas says doable. Can I call you please?"
"Sony is ready to take your call anytime."
"Do you have a solid relationship with Herman Coulas? He needs a call from us regarding some permitting help. "
"Andrew or Herman? Herman is Andrews father "
"Please let me know how it goes. I have a lot of respect for him. Yes it‚Äôs Herman the father."
"Talks to herman- he has a squatter in his house that started as an illegal sublease.      But the house is in Gresham. So I'm looking into who we can connect him to. "
"That's awful. Thank you for helping him. He's a decent man. "
"Reminder- we have the call right now with The 'reimagine Oregon' group led by Nkenge etc"
"Ok you're not showing up on the screen. "
"Ok- I think they requested leaders be visible. Either way I'll email and let them know you're on. "
"I'm moving stuff out of my late moms condo. "
"Ok- I gave them to number to unmute you"
"Update- they can't allow call in privileges, zoom is only allowing them to open up speaking through video. But they know you're on. "
"Maybe I will get out of here before the meeting ends at 1"
"I'll try to get home and log in before. "
"Can u put my speech in the chat"
"Also please agree to be the contact thx. "
"Well done. Thank you. Proud to work with you. "
"FYI I have just left the call."
"Mayor, are you able to join the call w the Auditor "
"Topic for tonight's interview. 6:15 pm our time.      Adam will be staffing you "
"Mayor- in your inbox you have your talking points and briefing materials for today's 11am reimagine Oregon recurring meeting with Nkenge and Katrina Holland. Cupid will be there with you. "
"Ok I'll call in. I'm moving stuff at my moms place. Can you please hold 3 PM for a personal appointment. I just have to take a package downstairs at 3 PM and I don't want to forget."
"Mayor, it sounds like the Governor's statement is on deck for 7a tomorrow. Our draft is your inbox when you have a few minutes to review. "

"In the statement do not refer to them as troops refer to them as federal officers. On the sentence regarding gas, referred to it as CS gas. At the end of the sentence I would say, 'if it is used at all.'"
"Sonia, is there any messaging our office needs to originate? Or is there a quote/ reference from us in KBs statement? "
"See your email and please text me separately with questions. Thanks. "

"Sonia I'm wondering if it makes more sense to pull the sentence referencing a CS gas and hold off on that until our media availability later in the week. I'm thinking maybe we just take the victory lap now on the fed with drawl, and answer the question about CS gas during the price availability. It will obviously come up."
"Thanks. It just occurs to me that if we keep that in it's going to temper the win because the focus will end up being on that."
"Mayor, when you have a moment please see the email I just sent, subject line 'Tweet?'"

"Commissioner Hardesty sent me racist messages that she was receiving. She asked if I would speak out against such messages during my press availability since she does not feel that she can do it. I think it would be a good partnership moment so I will send Sonia what I received from her staff."
"Yes. Will add to the prep document. Thanks. "
"Do we have any information on the use of CS gas by PPB in recent weeks."
"Yep... and all cameras are trained in that little red dot. #perspective"
"If OSP has access to PF&R facilities PPB will as well, I presume. "
"No no. Not just OSP. OSP and PPB. "
"Need to clarify before this call is over "
"I can jump in if you want, let me know. "
"That's not the Chief's commitment to make "
"Sure I also want state and local unified publicly on the strategy including tear gas"
"I am very pleased with the way this is going."
"Can you work with Nick to schedule the follow up. We should do it ASAP while everybody is available."
"They're sending a new # now, he says"
"Please let me know when we get it."
"Yep. Aja and I are keeping an eye out, will text when it arrives. "
"No. The consensus We have now all reached is 'threat of serious injury or loss of life.'"
"I want that to go out publicly assuming that the Governor's plan moves forward."
"Yes. That's good. You might text her to let her know that was the consensus among OSP, Governor, you, and PPB. "
"We now have consensus on the use of CS gas between the governor, Commissioner Hardesty and myself."
"Absolutely. If the plan doesn't work, I don't want people blaming us if we end up using CS gas under these limited circumstances. I hope we don't have to."
"I heard that from Chief Lovell too. And you were right to correct the Commissioner about how often they've used it since your directive. "

"Two other follow ups. Number one we've committed to the governor and her team that we will have the park clear prior to the operation commencing. Number two can we confirm whether or not we are having our 3 PM meeting with Commissioner Hardesty? There is still confusion on this point. If the governor gets the approvals she is seeking it could be a more amicable conversation. We should still have it."

"Commissioner Hardesty and I want to organize a cleanup of the federal courthouse. It could be a great community moment. Obviously it would have to wait till the fence comes down. I would love for us to be able to do this for the community."
"She wants to confirm PPB leadership will continue attending this LPSCC equity subcommittee. Chief has confirmed Equity Manager Marlon Marion will attend going forward. "

"(1) Feds never confirmed. We will hold 3p time to reconvene with Gov if they have an update. (2) Everett knows ab clean-up expectation and is ready to move forward once plan is confirmed. Robert is also updated but knows it's confidential and not yet confirmed. (3) I'm working on clean-up planning. "
"Can u suggest 2 track strategy. Refer, plus alt strategy anticipating it being overturned. "

"Apparently Commissioner Hardesty did not get the word that they had canceled the 3 PM call. Can you please call her staff and let them know. I'm not sure how that didn't get conveyed to the commissioner "
"Karly knew. We texted. They do not have good internal communication. I'll follow up. "

"Almost there with DC. Governor waiting on final confirmation. Her office will put out a statement (I'll review) and in the interest of time we will do something independent but consistent. I will tell Karly. I'll be with Adam to staff you for CNN and will make sure you are prepared to talk about whatever is public by then. "
"Sonia you can send it on my work email. I forgot I have a cell phone. I'm losing my mind obviously."
"Yes, was planning to send to both. Your mind is in the second drawer from the bottom. "
"Laugh out loud. I also want to make sure that our consensus agreement on the limited use of CS gas is made public."
"Laugh out loud. I also want to make sure that our consensus agreement on the limited use of CS gas is made public."
"Are you on this with Chad?  What's up?"
"Not sure. Blosser said everything was cleared with the White House. I'll follow up."
"Can you come in pls. In conf room on zoom. "

"This is awful. Why was he rehired?? Is he gone? If not he needs to be.          https://www.oregonlive.com/crime/2020/07/former-portland-police-officer-on-desk-duty-after-record-brutality-verdict-now-accused-of-sexually-harassing-co-worker.html"

"Commissioner Fritz is going to call you. She wants an additional allocation in the utility support for low income people going to communities of color. She'll explain it to you. I am little clarity on it."
"Closed the loop with her. All good. Update you tomorrow. "
"Hi Mayor. We just learned your media availability tomorrow conflicts with another press event. We'll reschedule yours and give you the time back. "
"Did we send out a corrected media advisory thx. "
"The Katrina Holland group (Friday morning mtgs you've attended) is announcing a policy platform. I think it's State-focused. I will find out in the morning. "
"Thanks! The invite came  for 10:45.      Call: 1-REDACTED   PIN: REDACTED#"
"Nik said he would call with more detail. I don't know the agenda as of now. "
"Liked ‚ÄúNik said he would call with more detail. I don't know the agenda as of now. ‚Äù"

"Spoke with Nik. Governor is working to set up the same meeting you called for yesterday. Will be her, you, Chief Lovell, FPS, DHS leadership, Hardesty to discuss the ongoing federal presence, the harm it's doing to our community, and the terms of their leaving. "
"The call had moved to 11:45 now.       Going to reach out and see if Alan can do 10:45"
"Please make sure contact information for both calls is in my calendar."
"1-REDACTED   Pin: REDACTED#      New line for conference call "

"Mayor, one of the people referenced here is Andre Miller, who you met with and who we are continuing to work with. Tia had a mtg scheduled with him for today. She has reached out to Rashad to see how you and our team can best support Andre and his family. "
"Mayor - want to let you know that I just dropped off dinner and your note to Andre and his family. They we incredibly grateful and appreciative. Thank you for doing that, very thoughtful!"
"Thank you, Tia! That was a lot of coordinating today. Much appreciated. ‚ò∫Ô∏è"
"Mayor-    Alan Fershweiler would like to have a quick call with you today or tomorrow.       Ok to schedule a call? "
"Alan confirmed for 10:45am       Call: 503-823-9789    (Also in the calendar) "
"Heard the Mayor did great on the call W/ Mr. Yarburough. Nike asked that I share! üëçüèΩ"
"1-REDACTED   Pin: REDACTED#      New line for conference call "
"I think it's 14 total homicides for the month of July. The chief just texted me indicating he and his team are meeting tomorrow to discuss and determine a response and course of action"

"Chief Lovell called and spoke with Nike offering ppb support to her and her team in responding to the shootings.       Following his meeting tomorrow with his team he's indicated he'll follow up with her to ensure that OVP is getting the support that it needs to effectively respond to the increase in violence"
"Thanks Robert. Please update me if there's anything more tonight, otherwise let's pick this up tomorrow. "

"Re us conf of mayors press conf: it will run 9-9:45. I don't know when governor statement coming out. I have press conf talking points for both scenarios (withdrawal announced and not announced). Would you rather participate or take a pass on this one?"
"Just spoke to Nik. 8:30 announcement, so you will be able to share that news in the press conf. Recommend participating. "
"Good on way to city hall now. "
"Sonia, will wait for your thumbs up to push out statement/release after 8:30"
"Rather than saying we have cut the police budget, why don't we say we have redirected millions of dollars from the police budget towards community needs"
"Or just say redirected. Don't say cut "

"Mayor - sending you updated scripts for this afternoon. Nic has provided questions in the updated version.       Also - Fritz has requested that at the beginning of the mtg you turn to Dee White since she was not able to testify this morning (Karla accidentally missed her on the line)       Let me know if you have questions, thanks!!"
"FYI your closing remarks have also been slightly modified "
"My talking points have us taking a vote on this today. But it looks like a first reading. Can you clarify?"
"Why is a motion in a second required for an ordinance. This just appears to be a first reading of a non-emergency ordinance."
"And while I'm at it why are we closing the record today?"
"Setting up a separate thread with Sam to clarify "
"I don't think these talking points are right. I think this is a first reading of a non-emergency ordinance. I also think the record remains open until the second reading."
"You are right about that. Moves to second reading next week. Written record will remain open until then. "
"Mayor - just sent an updated version of your talking points that reference Pastor Hennessee's written testimony. I attached both the talking points and his letter to the email. "
"Fritz - Tim says leaning yes but wanting to see whether there are compelling reasons to vote otherwise "
"Is he confident they will achieve what is necessary through collective bargaining given President Turner's recent statement against the proposal "
